projects.name: M2R Program (Stochastic SIR modelling)
highlights: Constructed Agent-based simulation for Stochastic SIR model with complex combination and realistic consideration
Processed and analysed data and results for comparison with different models in massive simulations
Compared the statistics and inference the results using Machine learning methods(e.g gaussian process regression)
